about_the_game:
Wake World is an cooperative multiplayer RPG set in a vast, post-apocalyptic world where rising sea levels have submerged the continents, leaving behind a labyrinth of scattered islands. Players must navigate this new waterlogged reality aboard customizable boats, form alliances, and explore diverse biomes.

Adventure Awaits You!

Explore the new world of Wake World alone or with friends. The game is all about discovery and offers a variety of activities such as sailing, fighting, cooking, gliding, farming, and helping villagers. Players can hop between islands, where they will encounter a diverse range of characters and creatures, including elks and radioactive spiders. The ultimate goal is to find the six artifacts that will put a reveal the mystery of what happened to the world, but players can also choose to ignore this quest and simply explore the world.

Your Ship Is Your Home

Your Steamship is not just a means of transportation, it's your home and base of operations. As you explore the world of Wake World, you will rely on your ship to traverse the ocean, discover new islands and face off against the dangers that lurk in the waters. As the seas become more hostiles you can fully customize and upgrade it!

Multiplayer

Wake World can be played as a coop multiplayer game, allowing players to join forces with others and embark on the adventure together. Play with friends or join a random group and work together to explore.

Wake World offers a unique and exciting open-world multiplayer experience, where players can explore, craft, sail, fight and much more. Download now and join the adventure!
